body:
[2016-01-12T02:00:48-352e287/linux-amd64-sid](https://build.golang.org/log/338b1b66a8c1672d742ab75b92b155594c3f1edd): Lots of runnable goroutines in the prologue of runtime_test.growing
[2016-01-12T17:31:01-505fa7b/linux-ppc64le-canonical](https://build.golang.org/log/09d6519812133df7b2ecd686ded1f50cdfad60f1): GC assist wait in testing.fmtDuration:256 +0x108 (call to runtime.convT2E with a nil x, so it allocates)
[2016-01-13T04:49:19-4ffba76/linux-amd64-nocgo](https://build.golang.org/log/7c6994cadd6414ff82a1f3e595292c6ed762a7c3): Runnable in fmt.(\*pp).doPrintf prologue
[2016-01-13T14:02:22-ceeb52d/linux-arm64-canonical](https://build.golang.org/log/dcb1ca82aeff9b693b6270296f9ac4c3bd4e7843): Runnable in fmt.(\*pp).doPrintf prologue
[2016-01-13T14:02:22-ceeb52d/linux-arm64-linaro](https://build.golang.org/log/8a5ff417506671ce41029c5a2cbc05d13b3fba99): Lots of runnable in runtime_test.growing prologue
[2016-01-13T18:22:21-b2cf5e7/dragonfly-amd64](https://build.golang.org/log/bbeb5202ccc6396aa79e431066432db784121ebe): Runnable in runtime_test.growStackIter progloue and runtime_test.TestStackGrowth.func3:111 +0x287 (call to runtime.selectgo, which can allocate sudogs)
[2016-01-13T18:39:15-9094e3a/linux-amd64-sid](https://build.golang.org/log/8a55f031bd9d1fd09535f3a03ac2f5350635d2a6): Runnable in regexp.(\*Regexp).doExecute prologue
[2016-01-13T19:06:28-dd6753a/windows-amd64-gce](https://build.golang.org/log/5df45430936c9f6d376564bdae6268bb4d838b21): Runnable in syscall.loadlibrary:98 +0x66 (call to runtime.cgocall)
[2016-01-13T19:06:40-4a0eee2/linux-amd64-nocgo](https://build.golang.org/log/4d5954e22a249cae73fd2273cb4f84cc21208476): Lots of runnable in runtime_test.growing prologue
[2016-01-13T19:06:40-4a0eee2/linux-ppc64le-canonical](https://build.golang.org/log/32a685531ec4d35cf6ca627e91bf442668757f51): Runnable in testing.fmtDuration:256 +0x108 (call to runtime.convT2E with a nil x, so it allocates)
[2016-01-13T19:06:40-4a0eee2/windows-386-gce](https://build.golang.org/log/6ac991673e22c6c8fa0aafbd19e133fee800105d): Runnable in syscall.Syscall:128 +0x4a (call to runtime.cgocall)
[2016-01-13T19:10:31-00c0a3a/linux-amd64](https://build.golang.org/log/f70ee88c5ebd29631a4e0977a2936f6ed510e13b): Lots of runnable in runtime_test.growing prologue
[2016-01-13T23:07:40-8c9ef9d/windows-amd64-gce](https://build.golang.org/log/1bab4bfbaeaf033da4525f25e358ac70ddf97fa6): Runnable in syscall.Syscall:128 +0x5c (call to runtime.cgocall)
[2016-01-14T02:04:50-5f23bc8/windows-amd64-gce](https://build.golang.org/log/f7ebe7f185a26667b06674510eeb0c76237daf9a): Runnable in syscall.Syscall:128 +0x5c (call to runtime.cgocall)
[2016-01-14T02:05:31-535741a/windows-386-gce](https://build.golang.org/log/62f9dc3dd900b6497a30e93d7c9900f8dd17eef2): Runnable in syscall.Syscall:128 +0x4a (call to runtime.cgocall)
[2016-01-14T03:08:30-353ee32/windows-amd64-gce](https://build.golang.org/log/dc33593b23bb89d0c5c9e0535a354ee3fb06ece2): Runnable in syscall.getprocaddress:113 +0x66 (call to runtime.cgocall)
[2016-01-14T03:16:20-b73d8fb/linux-amd64-noopt](https://build.golang.org/log/9c330348ed711e076fc6d12f355c795f8b526dd0): Lots of runnable in runtime_test.growing prologue
[2016-01-14T04:01:47-f36ee8c/linux-amd64-noopt](https://build.golang.org/log/e41d8777cb082e2fc77b2cab6536b79b7f608c83): Runnable in fmt.glob.func1:128 +0x2f (call to runtime.newobject).
[2016-01-14T15:23:41-38ca046/linux-arm64-linaro](https://build.golang.org/log/b866c09d55062c95af87a92a2ef239baab4d90f8): GC assist wait in fmt.glob.func1:128 +0x2c (call to runtime.newobject)

I'm not sure what's happening on Windows, but on the other platforms every single timeout has a goroutine in state "running" that's in a context where it could be allocating, or it clearly is trying to allocate and is blocked in an assist.
